name: Deck of Plants
description:
Deckbuilding game, where you plant plants, water them and collect for money to pay rent. Make sure to use special abilities of plants.

How to play: Use mouse, drag plant cards on the field. Once you're done, end your turn. Every turn plant loses 1 water, if this goes to 0 - plant dies. Rent collector comes once in a while, so make sure you can pay up.

Made for Ludum dare 52: Harvest. Made in 3 days
